movies.title: Karate
movies.plot: A scientist creates a diamond that can focus sun-rays to burn through anything. The villain, in a bid to get the diamond, kills the scientist. The scientist's karate-learning sons, Desh and Vijay, are separated from each other and their mother. Vjay grows up with his karate instructor while Desh is reared by a gypsy camp. How they find each other and avenge their father's death forms the rest of the narrative.
movies.simplePlot: A scientist creates a diamond that can focus sun-rays to burn through anything. The villain, in a bid to get the diamond, kills the scientist. The scientist's karate-learning sons, Desh and...

biography.bio: Mithun Chakraborty was born on June 16, 1947 in Barisal, Bengal Presidency, British India as Gouranga Chakraborti. He is an actor, known for Guru (2007), OMG: Oh My God! (2012) and Gunda (1998). He has been married to Yogeeta Bali since July 1982. They have four children. He was previously married to Helena Luke.
biography.name: Mithun Chakraborty

biography.bio: Deb Mukherjee is an actor and director, known for Kaminey (2009), Jo Jeeta Wohi Sikandar (1992) and Aansoo Ban Gaye Phool (1969).
biography.name: Deb Mukherjee

biography.bio: Kaajal Kiran was born as Sunita Kulkarni. She is known for her work on Hum Kisise Kum Naheen (1977), Wardaat (1981) and Bhula Na Dena (1981).
biography.name: Kaajal Kiran

biography.bio: Yogeeta Bali was born on December 29, 1952 in Bombay, State of Bombay, India. She is an actress and producer, known for Nauker (1979), Memsaab (1971) and Yauwan (1973). She has been married to Mithun Chakraborty since 1979. They have four children. She was previously married to Kishore Kumar.
biography.name: Yogeeta Bali

biography.bio: Prema Narayan was born on April 4, 1955 in West Bengal, India. She is an actress, known for Amanush (1975), Ghar (1978) and Umrao Jaan (1981).
biography.name: Prema Narayan

biography.bio: Kader Khan was born on December 11, 1937 in Pishin, Balochistan, British India. He is an actor and writer, known for Khoon Bhari Maang (1988), Hum (1991) and Muqaddar Ka Sikandar (1978).
biography.name: Kader Khan

biography.bio: Mazhar Khan was born on July 22, 1953 in India. He was an actor and director, known for Shaan (1980), Angaar (1992) and Dard (Conflict of Emotions) (1981). He was married to Zeenat Aman. He died on September 16, 1998 in Bombay, India.
biography.name: Mazhar Khan

biography.bio: Narendernath is an actor, known for Karate (1983).
biography.name: Narendernath

biography.bio: Mac Mohan was born on April 24, 1938 in Karachi, Sindh, British India as Mohan Makhijaney. He was an actor, known for Sholay (1975), Don (1978) and Mr. & Mrs. Khiladi (1997). He was married to Minny Makijany. He died on May 10, 2010 in Andheri, Mumbai, Maharashtra, India.
biography.name: Mac Mohan

biography.bio: Tun Tun was a prolific singer and comedienne appearing in over 100 Bollywood films. She began her career as a singer but was soon overshadowed by others. A heavy woman, she turned to comedy, using her weight to her advantage and continued her career as a comedienne. She died at the age of 76.
biography.name: Tun Tun

biography.bio: Guddi is known for his work on Jurm Aur Sazaa (1974), Bandit Queen (1994) and Karate (1983).
biography.name: Guddi

biography.placeOfBirth: Karimnagar, Hyderabad State, British India [now India]
biography.bio: P. Jairaj was born on September 28, 1909 in Karimnagar, Hyderabad State, British India. He is known for his work on Don (1978), Sholay (1975) and Khoon Bhari Maang (1988). He died on August 11, 2000 in Mumbai, Maharashtra, India.
biography.name: P. Jairaj

biography.bio: Guru Dharshan is an actor, known for Karate (1983) and Chhailla Babu (1977).
biography.name: Guru Dharshan

biography.bio: Seema Deo was born as Seema Saraf. She is an actress, known for Anand (1971), Koshish (1972) and Saraswatichandra (1968). She is married to Ramesh Deo. They have one child.
biography.name: Seema Deo

biography.bio: Gulshan Arora is an actor and producer, known for Raavan (1984), Ek Gunah Aur Sahi (1980) and Pyaasi Nadi (1973).
biography.name: Gulshan Arora

laboratory: Navrang Cine Center Pvt. Ltd., India
